item.description:
Join us for a Summer Brunch @ Greenside Grille by Raffael's @ the South Shore Country Club in Hingham!  If the weather cooperates, we will have outside seating! 

 

The Sunday Brunch Buffet is $19.99 for adults and includes tea, coffee and all of the breakfast, lunch and desserts you can eat! Rice Pilarf, Smoked Salmon, Scrambled Eggs, a Carving Station, an Omelette Station, a Waffle Station, a Chicken selection, Pasta du Jour and many more foods are available!  There is something for everyone.

 

Please note the time for this Brunch is a little later than usual @ 11:30am (rather than 11am) per RSVP Comments for the past couple of Brunches.  If 11am is too early for you this is the "later" event for you.

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Summer Brunch

Sunday, July 31st @ 11:30am

Greenside Grille by Raffael's

South Shore Country Club

274 South Street

Hingham, MA 02043

Phone #781-749-1720

Website: www.greensidegrille.com

 

Meeting Place: Please meet outside the front door. We may have to wait a few minutes to be seated.

Please Note:

1. We may be separated into two tables.  If so, we will get separate bills for each table.

2. We may be able to obtain a separate bill for food and drinks.

3. We may not be able to sit outside if the weather is not cooperative.

 

Organizer(s): Angela

Cost: Brunch is $19.99 plus an 18% gratuity plus tax for a total of $24.84 or $25 to keep things simple.

Event Fee: [Current] Annual Members & 1 Guest - FREE, Members - $2 each, Guests - $2 each; $6 to become a 2011 Annual Member

Min/Max: Minimum of 6 people by Noon on Saturday, July 30th and a maximum of 10 people.  *This has been updated as of 9pm on Friday, July 29th.*

Guests: 1 per member

RSVP Deadline: 6pm on Saturday, July 30. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by an Event Organizer prior to the event.  Please be aware that I will set the maximum number of RSVPs for whatever the Yes RSVPs are at that time.  We are not able to add on to our reservation.  *Please Note:  The deadline was pushed back from 4pm and is now 6pm (done on Friday, July 29th @ 9pm).*

Inclement Weather:  We will be dining regardles of the weather conditions (save for a hurricane warning).

Please bring cash. You are responsible for your portion of the bill including drinks, food, shared food, tax, and tip.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions :

Overview: Located just off Route 3A.

From the South: Take Route 3 North to Exit 14 (Nantasket / Rockland).  Upon exit, take Route 228 North for approximately 6 miles.  Take a left on Central Street (towards Town Hall & Hingham Historic District).  At second stop sign, take a left on South Street.  Follow for approximately ¼ mile and South Shore Country Club will be on left prior to West Hingham Train Station.

  From Boston & Points North: From Route 93 South take Exit 12 (Neponset / Quincy).  Follow signs to Route 3A South (beware of construction on Neponset River Bridge).  Follow 3A South through Quincy, over the Fore River Bridge and into Weymouth.  Take a right onto Beal Street (at 99 Restaurant).  Follow straight until 1st set of lights.  Take a left and South Shore Country Club will be on your right.  [Alternatively, you could take Route 93 South to Route 3 South and follow the directions above "From the South."]
item.how_to_find_us: Meet outside the front door or at our table after we are seated.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Summer Brunch
